mapper.insert:

bid,
uid,
baccount,
bcardnumber,

bstate,

mapper.update:
update bank
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
baccount = #{baccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bcardnumber = #{bcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btime = #{btime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bstate = #{bstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
